findings.title: ST - Stops Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users.

findings.title: Transfers User's Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users and may take advantage of it by calling the `pause` function.

findings.title: Transfers Liquidity to Team Wallet
findings.description: The contract transfers liquidity to the team wallet.

findings.title: Mints Tokens
findings.description: The AnkaaToken contract has a function _mint which allows minting tokens.

findings.title: Burns Tokens
findings.description: The AnkaaToken contract has a _burn function that can burn tokens.
